title: Ticket #7435: Fix RPATH for Python bindings in tarball
description:
When the python bindings shared libraries were moved into subdirectories under lib/python, their dependencies in lib could no longer be found at load time in the tarball release. The RPATH needs to be updated to look two directories up, instead of just one.

This problem can be worked around by setting LD_LIBRARY_PATH to include the condor lib directory.
